issue.title: [C++][Plasma] Fix memory size when using huge pages in plasma; other code cleanups
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8081](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8081). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the original code, 'PlasmaAllocator::SetFootprintLimit' happens before dealing with huge pages, which could change the memory limit. Also I found other dirty code needed to be written in a better way.
